summary.span: 用作定义 命名空间中的所有控件的公共方法、属性和事件的基类。

span.span: Serves as the base class that defines the methods, properties and events common to all controls in the namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供属性、 方法和事件所共有的所有 Web 服务器控件。The class provides the properties, methods, and events that are common to all Web server controls. 可以通过设置此类中定义的属性控制的外观和行为的 Web 服务器控件。You can control the appearance and behavior of a Web server control by setting properties defined in this class. 例如，通过使用控制的背景色和字体颜色的控件和属性，分别。For example, the background color and font color of a control are controlled by using the and properties, respectively. 可以显示边框的控件，你可以控制的边框宽度、 边框样式和边框颜色通过设置， ，和属性。On controls that can display a border, you can control the border width, the border style, and the border color by setting the , , and properties. 可以通过使用指定的 Web 服务器控件的大小和属性。The size of a Web server control can be specified by using the and properties. 可以通过设置某些属性指定控件的行为。The behavior of the control can be specified by setting certain properties. 你可以启用和禁用控件的设置属性。You can enable and disable a control by setting the property. 通过设置控制的 tab 键顺序中的控件的位置属性。The place of the control in the tab order is controlled by setting the property. 你可以通过设置指定控件的工具提示属性。You can specify a ToolTip for the control by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 并非所有控件都支持此类中定义的每个属性。Not all controls support every property defined in this class. 有关属性是否受支持的特定信息，请参阅特定控件的文档。For specific information about whether a property is supported, see the documentation for the specific control. > [!NOTE] > 此类中的某些属性呈现方式不同，具体取决于浏览器中。Some properties in this class render differently, depending on the browser. 其他呈现，但不起作用，某些属性不在所有呈现。Some properties do not render at all, while others render, but have no effect. 属性对象确定在其中一个 Web 服务器控件呈现的方式。The property of the object determines the way in which a Web server control renders. 浏览器支持 HTML 4.0属性将包含正则表达式对象，并且大多数属性将呈现使用 HTML 4.0 样式特性。For browsers that support HTML 4.0, the property will contain a regular object, and most properties will be rendered using HTML 4.0 style attributes. 将使用的浏览器不知道是否支持 HTML 4.0对象。Browsers that are not known to support HTML 4.0 will use the object. 这会自动映射到任何相关的 HTML 3.2 标记特性的样式特性。This will automatically map the style attributes to any relevant HTML 3.2 tag attributes. 在某些情况下，如与属性，样式特性将转换为其他标记，如``标记。In some cases, such as with the property, the style attributes will be converted into additional tags, such as `` tags. 在某些情况下，将没有映射执行。In some cases, there will be no mapping performed. 有关如何将属性呈现在不同的浏览器中的特定信息，请参阅特定属性的文档。For specific information about how a property is rendered in different browsers, see the documentation for the specific property. 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples [!code-csharp[WebControlAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebControlAddAttributesToRender/CS/addattrib.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebControlAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebControlAddAttributesToRender/VB/addattrib.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置使您得以快速导航到 Web 服务器控件的访问键。

span.span: Gets or sets the access key that allows you to quickly navigate to the Web server control.

value.span: 用于快速定位到 Web 服务器控件的访问键。

span.span: The access key for quick navigation to the Web server control.

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定 Web 服务器控件的键盘快捷方式。Use the property to specify the keyboard shortcut for the Web server control. 这可以通过按键盘上的 ALT 键和指定的字符的密钥快速导航到控件。This allows you to navigate quickly to the control by pressing the ALT key and the key for the specified character on the keyboard. 例如，将控件的访问密钥设置为 string`"D"`指示用户可以导航到该控件通过按 ALT + D。For example, setting the access key of a control to the string `"D"` indicates that the user can navigate to the control by pressing ALT+D. 仅是单字符字符串可用于进行属性。Only a single character string is allowed for the property. 如果你尝试将此属性设置为一个值，既不是`null`， ，也不是单字符字符串，将引发异常。If you attempt to set this property to a value that is neither `null`, , nor a single character string, an exception is thrown. > [!NOTE] > 仅在 Internet Explorer 4.0 及更高版本支持此属性。This property is supported only in Internet Explorer 4.0 and later. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置和使用属性控件。The following example illustrates how to set and use the property of a control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要将呈现客户端上的 Web 服务器控件的特性和样式，通常调用和方法来插入每个特性和样式单独到输出流。To render attributes and styles for a Web Server control on the client, you typically call the and methods to insert each attribute and style individually to the output stream. 若要简化过程，此方法封装了对所有调用和对于每个属性和与 Web 服务器控件关联的样式的方法。To simplify the process, this method encapsulates all calls to the and methods for every attribute and style associated with the Web server control. 所有特性和样式都插入到在单个方法调用的输出流。All attributes and styles are inserted into the output stream in a single method call. 此方法通常重写由控件开发人员在派生类中，若要将适当的特性和样式类的输出流。This method is typically overridden by control developers in derived classes to insert the appropriate attributes and styles to the output stream for the class. > [!NOTE] > 方法无法用于插入客户端脚本。The method cannot be used to insert client script. 若要使用客户端脚本，请参阅类。To use client script, see the class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建派生自的类类。The following example demonstrates how to create a class that derives from the class. 基实现方法被重写，以添加到派生的类中相应的特性输出流。The base implementation of the method is overridden to add attributes appropriate to the derived class in the output stream. remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合包含在 Web 服务器控件的开始标记中声明的所有特性的集合。The collection contains a collection of all attributes declared in the opening tag of a Web server control. 这允许你以编程方式控制与 Web 服务器控件关联的属性。This allows you to programmatically control the attributes associated with a Web server control. 你可以将属性添加到集合，或从集合中移除属性。You can add attributes to the collection or remove attributes from the collection. > [!NOTE] > 此属性呈现使用控件的开始标记，而不考虑浏览器设置中的集合中的所有属性。This property is rendered with all attributes in the collection in the control’s opening tag, regardless of the browser settings. 并非所有浏览器支持呈现的每个属性。Not all browsers support every attribute that is rendered. 通过浏览器通常忽略属性不受支持。The unsupported attributes are usually ignored by the browser. > [!NOTE] > 无法添加客户端将脚本保存到实例使用集合。You cannot add client-side script to a instance using the collection. 若要添加客户端脚本，请使用属性控件。To add client-side script, use the property on the control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何属性可以用于运行 JavaScript 命令时控件失去焦点。The following example illustrates how the property of a can be used to run a JavaScript command when the control loses focus. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的 Web 服务器控件的边框颜色。Use the property to specify the border color of the Web Server control. 此属性使用设置对象。This property is set using a object. > [!NOTE] > 属性将只为某些呈现控件。The property will render only for certain controls. 例如， ， ， ， ，和控件将呈现此属性。For example, the , , , , and controls will render this property. 它还将适用于， ，和控制，如果其`RepeatLayout`属性设置为`RepeatLayout.Table`，而不`RepeatLayout.Flow`。It will also work for the , , and controls, if their `RepeatLayout` property is set to `RepeatLayout.Table`, not `RepeatLayout.Flow`. 但是，呈现为`bordercolor`特性，它不是 HTML 3.2 标准的一部分。However, it is rendered as the `bordercolor` attribute, which is not part of the HTML 3.2 standard. `bordercolor`属性适用于 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本 3.0 或更高版本，但不是大多数其他浏览器。The `bordercolor` attribute works for Microsoft Internet Explorer version 3.0 or later, but not most other browsers. 当未设置属性，浏览器将使用其默认边框颜色。When the property is not set, the browser will use its default border color. 请参阅你的浏览器，以确定其默认颜色方案。Refer to your browser to determine its default color scheme. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性控件，继承自基类。The following example illustrates how to set the property of the control, which is inherited from the base class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定 Web 服务器控件的边框样式。Use the property to specify the border style for the Web server control. 此属性使用其中一个设置枚举值。This property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |边框样式Border Style|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|未设置的边框样式。The border style is not set.| |`None`|无边框No border| |`Dotted`|虚线边框。A dotted line border.| |`Dashed`|点划线边框。A dashed line border.| |`Solid`|实线边框。A solid line border.| |`Double`|双实线边框。A solid double line border.| |`Groove`|用于凹陷边框外观的凹槽状边框。A grooved border for a sunken border appearance.| |`Ridge`|用于凸起边框外观的突起边框。A ridged border for a raised border appearance.| |`Inset`|用于凹陷控件外观的内嵌边框。An inset border for a sunken control appearance.| |`Outset`|用于凸起控件外观的外嵌边框。An outset border for a raised control appearance.| > [!NOTE] > 此属性将不早于任何 Web 服务器控件的 Microsoft Internet 资源管理器 4 呈现在浏览器中。This property will not render on browsers earlier than Microsoft Internet Explorer 4 for any Web server control. 没有向其 HTML 3.2 中的无等效项。There is no equivalent to it in HTML 3.2. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性控件，继承自基类。The following example illustrates how to set the property of the control, which is inherited from the base class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要在 Web 服务器控件的客户端上呈现的 CSS 类。Use the property to specify the CSS class to render on the client for the Web Server control. 此属性将呈现在浏览器中的所有控件。This property will render on browsers for all controls. 它将始终呈现为的类特性，而不考虑浏览器中。It will always be rendered as the class attribute, regardless of the browser. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). 例如，假设有以下 Web 服务器控件声明：For example, suppose you have the following Web server control declaration: ``` ``` 以下 HTML 呈现在客户端以前的 Web 服务器控件声明上：The following HTML is rendered on the client for the previous Web server control declaration: ``` ``` 级联样式表 (CSS) 用于自定义控件的外观，如果使用内联样式或单独的 CSS 文件，但不要同时。If you use cascading style sheets (CSS) to customize the appearance of a control, use either inline styles or a separate CSS file, but not both. 使用内联样式和单独的 CSS 文件可能会导致意外的结果。Using both inline styles and a separate CSS file could cause unexpected results. > [!NOTE] > 不支持 CSS，设置浏览器上属性将产生任何影响。On browsers that do not support CSS, setting the property will have no effect. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性可以更改的样式控件。The following example illustrates how to use the property to change the style of a control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以用于更改为呈现名称的单个 Web 控件的属性。This property can be used to change the name that is rendered for the property of individual Web controls. 默认情况下，此属性返回"aspNetDisabled"。By default, this property returns "aspNetDisabled". 当返回派生的类中重写`false`的值属性呈现的值为`class`该控件的 HTML 元素的属性。When is overridden in a derived class to return `false`, the value of the property is rendered as the value of the `class` attribute of the HTML element for the control. 在此情况下中的值是否属性，这两个 CSS 类将应用于所呈现的 HTML 元素。In that case, if there is a value in the property, both CSS classes will be applied to the rendered HTML element. `class`属性将包含的值的属性的值之后属性，以空格分隔。The `class` attribute will consist of the value of the property followed by the value of the property, separated by a space. 此属性是静态的这意味着你可以将仅对其进行设置类。This property is static, which means that you can set it only for the class. 将其设置为任意值用于 Web 应用程序中的所有控件。Whatever value you set it to is used for all controls in a Web application. 不能指定不同的单个控件的值。You cannot specify different values for individual controls. 如果你想要使用的类名"aspNetDisabled"的默认值不同，通常情况下将用于在执行该操作的代码`Application_Start`方法的 Global.asax 文件中，如下面的示例中所示：If you want to use a class name different from the default value of "aspNetDisabled", you typically put the code to do that in the `Application_Start` method of the Global.asax file, as shown in the following example: ```vb Private Sub Application_Start( ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As EventArgs) WebControl.DisabledCssClass = "customDisabledClassName" End Sub ``` ```csharp void Application_Start(object sender, EventArgs e) { WebControl.DisabledCssClass = "customDisabledClassName"; } ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示了已禁用的呈现的 HTML控制属性是`false`，当属性具有其默认值，以及何时属性为空。The following example shows rendered HTML for a disabled control when the property is `false`, when the property has its default value, and when the property is empty. `Test` 下面的示例演示相同的条件下呈现 HTML 只不过属性具有值"SampleStyle"`:`The following example shows rendered HTML under the same conditions except that the property has the value "SampleStyle"`:` `Test` 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件的属性设置为`false`，控件通常显示为灰色。When the property of a control is set to `false`, the control typically appears dimmed. 如果控件是一个输入的元素，浏览器可以阻止用户单击或在其中键入内容。If the control is an input element, the browser prevents the user from clicking or typing in it. 为服务器控件呈现的 HTML 元素被标记为禁用通过设置其`disabled`属性或其 CSS`class`属性。HTML elements that are rendered for a server control are marked as disabled by setting their `disabled` attribute or their CSS `class` attribute. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 。For more information, see and . 此属性将沿控件层次结构传播。This property propagates down the control hierarchy. 如果禁用容器控件，还将禁用该容器内的子控件。If you disable a container control, the child controls within that container are also disabled. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. > [!NOTE] > 在自定义的复合控件中，此继承行为不适用于尚未创建其子控件的控件。In a custom composite control, this inheritance behavior does not apply to controls that have not yet created their child controls. 你必须是将设置的启用的状态的子控件在创建，或重写时属性来调用方法。You must either set the enabled state of the child controls when they are created, or override the property to call the method. > [!NOTE] > 禁用控件只会阻止与用户通过浏览器 UI 控件的交互。Disabling a control only prevents interaction with the control by the user through the browser UI. 它是用户可以生成请求，提交页来处理，即使禁用了该页上的控件的回发。It is possible for a user to craft a request that submits a postback that is processed by the page even if controls on the page are disabled. 处理回发请求之前，请检查以确保控件已启用且可见。Before you process a postback request, check to make sure that the control is enabled and visible. 并非所有控件都支持此属性。Not all controls support this property. 查看有关详细信息的单个控件。See the individual controls for details. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何启用和禁用控件，继承自基类，通过设置其属性以编程方式。The following example illustrates how to enable and disable a control, inherited from the base class, by setting its property programmatically. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否为指定的控件启用主题。The property indicates whether themes are enabled for a specified control. 当属性是`true`，应用程序的主题目录搜索要应用的控件外观。When the property is `true`, the theme directory for the application is searched for control skins to apply. 如果用于特定的控件中的主题目录存在，则不会应用外观。If no skin for the particular control exists in the theme directory, skins are not applied. 当属性是`false`，则不搜索主题目录和内容未使用属性。When the property is `false`, the theme directory is not searched and the contents of the property is not used. 控件可以重写值由其父控件或包含的页的设置。A control can override the value set by its parent control or the containing page. 例如，如果父控件具有属性设置为`false`，您可以有选择地应用于通过设置父项中包含的子控件的主题属性`true`上各个子控件。For example, if a parent control has the property set to `false`, you can selectively apply themes to child controls that are contained within the parent by setting the property to `true` on the individual child controls. 可以在页、 容器或控制级别启用主题。Themes can be enabled at the page, container, or control level. 当在页面或容器级别禁用主题时，禁用页面或容器中包含的所有控件的主题。When theming is disabled at the page or container level, themes are disabled for all controls that are contained by the page or container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定 Web 服务器控件的字体属性。Use the property to specify the font properties of the Web Server control. 此属性包含可访问的子属性以声明方式以形式`Property-Subproperty`(例如`Font-Bold`) 或以编程方式中的窗体`Property.Subproperty`(例如`Font.Bold`)。This property includes subproperties that can be accessed declaratively in the form of `Property-Subproperty` (for example `Font-Bold`) or programmatically in the form of `Property.Subproperty` (for example `Font.Bold`). 在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本 4 的所有控件之前的浏览器中将呈现所有但一个子属性。All but one subproperty will render in browsers prior to Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4 for all controls. 它们是： ， ， ， ， ， ，和(但仅如名为字体大小`Small`， `Smaller`，依此类推，起作用)。They are: , , , , , , and (but only named font sizes, such as `Small`, `Smaller`, and so on, will work). > [!NOTE] > 虽然这些子属性呈现在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本 4 之前的浏览器中，是不同于更高版本浏览器呈现的 HTML。Although these subproperties render in browsers prior to Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4, the HTML that is rendered is different than later browsers. 而不是呈现为样式特性，这些子属性呈现为 HTML 元素，如``和``。Instead of rendering as style attributes, these subproperties are rendered as HTML elements, such as `` and ``. 将不会呈现在较早的所有控件的浏览器的一个子属性是。The one subproperty that will not render on earlier browsers for all controls is . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性以收集相关字体信息从控件。The following example illustrates how to use the property to gather font information from a control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的 Web 服务器控件的高度。Use the property to specify the height of the Web server control. > [!NOTE] > 此属性不会早于 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本 4 的浏览器中的所有控件的呈现。This property does not render for all controls in browsers earlier than Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4. 无法呈现在较早的浏览器中的此属性的控件包括， ， ，和任何验证控件。Controls that do not render this property in earlier browsers include , , , and any validation controls. ，和也不呈现在较早的浏览器中的此属性时其`RepeatLayout`属性设置为`RepeatLayout.Flow`。The , and also do not render this property in earlier browsers when their `RepeatLayout` property is set to `RepeatLayout.Flow`. 此外，只有单元类型的`Pixel`和`Percentage`较早的浏览器都支持。Furthermore, only unit types of `Pixel` and `Percentage` are supported in earlier browsers. 由于此属性为非标准 HTML，Web 服务器控件显示为表，如和，不支持此属性在浏览器中早于 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本 4。Because this property is nonstandard HTML, Web server controls that display as a table, such as and , do not support this property in browsers earlier than Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4. > [!NOTE] > 若要设置单元属性类型不是默认的`Pixel`，你必须创建新的单位类型特定于所需的单位类型。To set the property to a unit type other than the default of `Pixel`, you must create a new unit type specific to the unit type you want. 例如，若要设置控件的属性到 100 的百分比值，你可以执行以下操作：For example, to set a control's property to a percentage value of 100, you could do the following: > > `myWebControl.Width = Unit.Percentage(100);` > > 有关详细信息可用于在单位类型属性，请参阅类。For more information on the unit types available for the property, see the class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以声明方式设置属性控件，继承自基类。The following example illustrates how to declaratively set the property of the control, inherited from the base class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个只读属性。This is a read-only property. 如果你想要禁用的控件，则设置其属性`false`。If you want to disable a control, you set its property to `false`. 如果控件不包含由另一个控件的值属性始终是相同的值属性。If a control is not contained by another control, the value of the property is always the same as the value of the property. 属性具有值不同于属性如果控件是另一个控件的子级，并且所有以下情况下为真：The property has a value that is different from the property if a control is a child of another control and if all the following circumstances are true: - 值属性或父控件的属性是`false`。The value of the property or the property of the parent control is `false`. - 子控件的属性设置为`true`。The property of the child control is set to `true`. 在此情况下，子控件将继承父控件的已禁用的状态。In this situation, the child control inherits the disabled state of the parent control. 子控件的属性返回`false`以指示该控件禁用，即使子控件已不显式禁用通过设置其属性`false`。The property of the child control returns `false` to indicate that the control is disabled even though the child control was not explicitly disabled by setting its property to `false`. 父控件本身可能将其属性设置为`true`但可能会从其父项继承禁用的状态，依次类推。The parent control itself might have its property set to `true` but might inherit the disabled state from its parent, and so on. 当 ASP.NET 呈现时的服务器控件的 HTML 元素时，它可以标记的元素，因为禁用设置其`disabled`属性或其 CSS`class`属性。When ASP.NET renders HTML elements for a server control, it marks the elements as disabled by setting their `disabled` attribute or their CSS `class` attribute. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 。For more information, see and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控件开发人员使用。The method is used primarily by control developers. 视图状态是累积的服务器控件属性的值。View state is the cumulative values of the properties for a server control. 这些值放在中自动对于服务器控件，这是实例属性的类。These values are placed automatically in the property for the server control, which is an instance of the class. 属性值随后会保存到一个字符串对象的保存状态的服务器控件生命周期阶段后。The property value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the life cycle for the server control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 页面生命周期概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Page Life Cycle Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991). 视图状态保存时，此字符串对象返回到客户端作为变量存储在隐藏 HTML`input`元素。When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in a hidden HTML `input` element. 在创作自定义服务器控件时，你可以通过重写中提高效率方法并修改服务器控件的属性。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding the method and modifying the property for your server control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用控件的外观包含在主题目录中的一个或多个外观文件中。Skins available to a control are contained in one or more skin files in a theme directory. 属性指定哪些这些将应用于控件的外观。The property specifies which of these skins to apply to the control. 外观是特定于特定的控件;不能共享之间的不同类型的控件的外观设置。A skin is specific to a particular control; you cannot share skin setting between controls of different types. 如果你未设置属性，如果已定义控件使用的默认外观。If you do not set the property, a control uses the default skin if one is defined. 例如，如果而无需外观 ID 为定义控制，则该外观适用于所有控件，不显式引用它按 ID 的外观和，未设置为禁用主题。For example, if a skin without an ID is defined for an control, then that skin applies to all controls that do not explicitly reference a skin by ID and that are not set to disable theming. 如果为定义具有 ID 的外观控制，则该外观仅适用于控制其设置为该 id。If a skin with an ID is defined for an control, then that skin applies to only controls whose is set to that ID. 如果主题目录中的外观文件不包含具有指定的外观、在运行时引发异常。If the skin files in a theme directory do not contain a skin with the specified , an exception is thrown at runtime.

exception.span: 主题中不存在 属性中指定的外观。

span.span: The skin specified in the property does not exist in the theme.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用集合来管理 Web 服务器控件的外部标记中呈现的样式特性。Use the collection to manage the style attributes rendered in the outer tag of the Web server control. 此属性将在所有控件的所有浏览器上呈现。This property will render on all browsers for all controls. > [!NOTE] > 不支持样式特性的浏览器将忽略呈现的 HTML。Browsers that do not support style attributes will ignore the rendered HTML. 通过强类型的样式属性设置的任何样式值 (例如， `BackColor="Red"`) 将自动重写此集合中的相应值。Any style values set through the strongly typed style properties (for example, `BackColor="Red"`) will automatically override a corresponding value in this collection. 在此集合中设置的值不会自动反映通过强类型的样式属性。Values set in this collection are not automatically reflected by the strongly typed style properties. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来隐藏或显示页上的控件。The following example illustrates how to use the property to hide or display a control on a page. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 在派生类中，此属性指示 ASP.NET 应的呈现方式 HTML 控件时控件被禁用。In derived classes, this property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. ## 禁用 ASP.NET Web 控件Disabling ASP.NET Web Controls 当ASP.NET 控件的属性设置为`false`（即，当控件为禁用），其目的是 ASP.NET 应呈现在页中，控件，但显示处于禁用状态 （通常显示为灰色）。When the property of an ASP.NET control is set to `false` (that is, when the control is disabled), the intent is that ASP.NET should render the control in the page, but display it in a disabled state (typically dimmed). 如果禁用了父控件，该控件的子级也会显示为禁用。If a parent control is disabled, children of that control are also displayed as disabled. 在此情况下，子控件的属性设置为`false`，即使其属性可能设置为`true`。In that case, the child control's property is set to `false`, even though its property might be set to `true`. 在 ASP.NET 3.5 和更早版本中，当控件的属性是`false`，ASP.NET 集`disabled`属性为"disabled"中的控件呈现的 HTML 元素。In ASP.NET 3.5 and earlier versions, when a control's property is `false`, ASP.NET sets the `disabled` attribute to "disabled" in the HTML element that it renders for the control. 但是，HTML 4.01 标准允许`disabled`属性仅用于用户输入的某些元素。However, the HTML 4.01 standard allows the `disabled` attribute only on certain elements that are used for user input. 例如，`disabled`属性可用于进行`input`元素，但不是能为`span`元素。For example, the `disabled` attribute is allowed for `input` elements, but not for `span` elements. 大多数浏览器支持仅显示的元素具有禁用的默认外观`disabled`属性。Most browsers support a default disabled appearance for display-only elements that have `disabled` attributes. 但是，为了符合 HTML 标准，默认情况下 ASP.NET 4 忽略无效的特性。However, in order to comply with HTML standards, by default ASP.NET 4 omits invalid attributes. ## 如何使用 SupportsDisabledAttribute 属性How the SupportsDisabledAttribute Property is Used 如果属性是`true`，ASP.NET 呈现`disabled`属性时该控件禁用状态。If the property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when the control is disabled. 如果此属性为`false`，ASP.NET 呈现`class`属性时该控件禁用状态。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when the control is disabled. 派生的类重写此属性以返回`false`如果满足所有以下条件：Derived classes override this property to return `false` if all the following conditions are true: - 控件呈现的 HTML 元素将不支持`disabled`属性。The control renders an HTML element that does not support the `disabled` attribute. - 属性指示 ASP.NET 版本号低于 4.0。The property indicates an ASP.NET version number lower than 4.0. 属性不一定表示为控件呈现的 HTML 元素是否支持 （允许）`disabled`属性。The property does not necessarily indicate whether the HTML element that is rendered for a control supports (allows) the `disabled` attribute. 如果控件的属性指示 ASP.NET 版本号低于 4.0 中，控件的值属性可能会返回`true`即使呈现的 HTML 不支持`disabled`属性。If a control's property indicates an ASP.NET version number lower than 4.0, the value of the control's property might return `true` even if the rendered HTML does not support the `disabled` attribute. ## 已禁用控件的向后兼容性Backward Compatibility for Disabled Controls 当你使用 Visual Studio 从早期版本升级到 ASP.NET 4 的 Web 项目时，Visual Studio 将自动设置`controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion`Web.config 文件中的属性 (哪些集属性) 到更早的版本号。When you use Visual Studio to upgrade a Web project to ASP.NET 4 from an earlier version, Visual Studio automatically sets the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute in the Web.config file (which sets the property) to the earlier version number. 因为属性始终返回`true`时属性低于 4.0，这会导致 Web 控件，像在早期版本中那样，已禁用控件的呈现 HTML。Because the property always returns `true` when the property is lower than 4.0, this causes Web controls to render HTML for disabled controls as they did in the earlier version. 如果你想要使用 ASP.NET 4 中引入的算法呈现 HTML 的升级的 Web 站点，你可以更改或删除`controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion`属性。If you want an upgraded Web site to render HTML using the algorithm introduced in ASP.NET 4, you can change or remove the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. ## 使用 CSS 设置已禁用的外观Setting a Disabled Appearance By Using CSS 如果控件的属性是`false`并且控件将禁用 ASP.NET 集`class`呈现的 HTML 元素的值的属性属性。If the property of a control is `false` and the control is disabled, ASP.NET sets the `class` attribute of the rendered HTML element to the value of the property. 默认值属性是"aspNetDisabled"。The default value of the property is "aspNetDisabled". 若要提供禁用已禁用控件的外观，你必须定义的值表示类的 CSS 规则属性。To provide a disabled appearance for disabled controls, you must define a CSS rule for the class that is represented by the value of the property. 控件可能具有多个值呈现的 HTML 元素其`class`属性中的值是否其属性。The HTML element that is rendered for a control might have more than one value in its `class` attribute if there is a value in its property. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. ## Examples 以下示例显示了已禁用控件：The following example shows markup for a disabled control: `` 在 ASP.NET 3.5 和更早版本中，此标记的以下 HTML 呈现：In ASP.NET 3.5 and earlier versions, this markup renders the following HTML: `Test` 在 ASP.NET 4 中，如果值属性是 4.0 或更高版本，并且如果属性设置为其默认值，则相同的标记的以下 HTML 呈现：In ASP.NET 4, if the value of the property is 4.0 or greater, and if the property is set to its default value, the same markup renders the following HTML: `Test`

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定或确定 Web 窗体页上的 Web 服务器控件的 tab 键索引。Use the property to specify or determine the tab index of a Web server control on the Web Forms page. 当你按`Tab`密钥，Web 服务器控件接收焦点的顺序由的每个控件的属性。When you press the `Tab` key, the order in which the Web server controls receive focus is determined by the property of each control. 当最初加载页时，接收的第一个项集中时`Tab`按下键是地址栏。When a page is initially loaded, the first item that receives focus when the `Tab` key is pressed is the address bar. 接下来，Web 窗体页上的控件 tab 键以升序基于的值的按顺序属性的每个控件，从最小正数，则为非 0 值开始。Next, the controls on the Web Forms page are tabbed to in ascending order, based on the value of the property of each control, starting with the smallest positive, nonzero value. 如果多个控件共享相同的选项卡索引，则控件将在 Web 窗体页上声明了它们的顺序接收焦点。If multiple controls share the same tab index, the controls will receive focus in the order they are declared on the Web Forms page. 最后，具有选项卡索引为零的控件是选项卡式到声明它们的顺序。Finally, controls that have a tab index of zero are tabbed to in the order they are declared. > [!NOTE] > 只有具有非零的 tab 键索引的控件将呈现`tabindex`属性。Only controls with a nonzero tab index will render the `tabindex` attribute. 可以通过设置从 tab 键顺序中删除 Web 服务器控件为负值的属性。You can remove a Web Server control from the tab order by setting the property to a negative value. > [!NOTE] > 仅在 Internet Explorer 4 及更高版本支持此属性。This property is supported only in Internet Explorer 4 and later. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性设置页上的控件的 tab 键顺序。The following example illustrates how to use the property of the to set the tab order of controls on the page. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定当鼠标指针悬停在 Web 服务器控件上时显示的自定义文本。Use the property to specify the custom text that is displayed when the mouse pointer hovers over the Web server control. > [!NOTE] > 此属性不为所有浏览器呈现。This property is rendered for all browsers. 但是，仅 Microsoft Internet Explorer 将显示此属性为工具提示。However, only Microsoft Internet Explorer will display this property as a ToolTip. 所有其他浏览器将忽略此属性。All other browsers will ignore this property. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性控件，继承自基类。The following example illustrates how to set the property on the control, which is inherited from the base class. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 使控件跟踪其视图状态的更改，以便可以将这些更改存储在对象的 属性中。

span.span: Causes the control to track changes to its view state so they can be stored in the object's property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控件开发人员使用。The method is used primarily by control developers. 标记开始跟踪并将更改保存到该控件的视图状态的起始点。The marks the starting point at which to begin tracking and saving changes to the view state for the control. 方法时将自动调用 asp.net 服务器控件进行初始化。The method is called automatically by ASP.NET when a server control is initialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以指定的 Web 服务器控件的宽度。Use the property to specify the width of the Web server control. > [!NOTE] > 此属性不会早于 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本 4 的浏览器中的所有控件的呈现。This property does not render for all controls in browsers earlier than Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4. 无法呈现在较早的浏览器中的此属性的控件包括， ， ，和任何验证控件。Controls that do not render this property in earlier browsers include , , , and any validation controls. ，和也不呈现在较早的浏览器中的此属性时其`RepeatLayout`属性设置为`RepeatLayout.Flow`。The , and also do not render this property in earlier browsers when their `RepeatLayout` property is set to `RepeatLayout.Flow`. 此外，只有单元类型的`Pixel`和`Percentage`较早的浏览器都支持。Furthermore, only unit types of `Pixel` and `Percentage` are supported in earlier browsers. 由于此属性为非标准 HTML，Web 服务器控件显示为表，如和，不支持此属性在浏览器中早于 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本 4。Because this property is nonstandard HTML, Web server controls that display as a table, such as and , do not support this property in browsers earlier than Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4. > [!NOTE] > 若要设置以声明方式为一个单元的属性类型不是默认的`Pixel`，你必须创建新的单位类型特定于所需的单位类型。To set the property declaratively to a unit type other than the default of `Pixel`, you must create a new unit type specific to the unit type you want. 例如，若要设置控件的属性到 100 的百分比值，你可以执行以下操作：For example, to set a control's property to a percentage value of 100, you could do the following: > > `myWebControl.width = Unit.Percentage(100);` > > 有关详细信息可用于在单位类型属性，请参阅类。For more information on the unit types available for the property, see the class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以声明方式设置属性控件，继承自基类。The following example illustrates how to declaratively set the property of the control, inherited from the base class.
